mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PASSWD, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_BIRTH, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_ZIPCODE, MEMBER_ADDR1, MEMBER_ADDR2, MEMBER_DATE, MEMBER_GRADE, MEMBER_LOG ) VALUES ( MEMBER_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, TRIM (BOTH FROM #{MEMBER_ID}), #{MEMBER_PASSWD}, #{MEMBER_NAME}, #{MEMBER_BIRTH}, #{MEMBER_EMAIL}, #{MEMBER_PHONE}, #{MEMBER_ZIPCODE}, #{MEMBER_ADDR1}, #{MEMBER_ADDR2}, sysdate, 'NORMAL', sysdate )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{MEMBER_ID}
